name: Poker Pack
description:
5 different Poker card games! Compete against the computer's AI for a real challenge.

Try your hand at 5 different Poker games: Limit and No-Limit Texas Hold'em, Omaha, Razz, and 7-Card Stud! Make your bets and watch the action unfold. This is an extremely fast-paced computer game, great for player who don't like to wait. Customize the number of players, starting balance and blinds. Detailed game rules are included for all 5 games.

Features:

* No Limit Texas Hold'em
* Limit Texas Hold'em
* Omaha
* Razz
* 7 Card Stud
* Play against the computer AI
* 1 to 5 computer opponents
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack
